query: SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM campaigns WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR advertiser_addr = $8::varchar) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR advertiser_addr LIKE $10::varchar) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR status = $12::campaign_status) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR status != $14::campaign_status) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR briefing_hash = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR briefing_hash LIKE $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR briefing_json = $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR briefing_json LIKE $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR budget = $24::varchar) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR budget > $26::varchar) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR budget < $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR price_per_point = $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $34::varchar) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR valid_until = $36::timestamptz) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR report_hash = $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR created_at = $40::timestamptz) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $42::boolean) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR force_hydrate = $44::boolean) AND (NOT $45::boolean OR total_collabs = $46::int4) AND (NOT $47::boolean OR total_spent = $48::varchar) AND (NOT $49::boolean OR total_budget = $50::varchar) AND (NOT $51::boolean OR impression_count = $52::int4) AND (NOT $53::boolean OR reply_count = $54::int4) AND (NOT $55::boolean OR repost_count = $56::int4) AND (NOT $57::boolean OR like_count = $58::int4)
